definitions.definition: Belief in the One True God, defined by More as personal, immaterial and trinitarian .
The belief in a single deity (one god or goddess ); especially within an organized religion .
The belief that God is one person (Judaism, Unitarian Christianity, Islam), not three persons (Trinitarian Christianity, Hinduism)

main_definition: ( obsolete ) Belief in the One True God, defined by More as personal, immaterial and trinitarian .
secondary_definitions: The belief in a single deity (one god or goddess ); especially within an organized religion .
The belief that God is one person (Judaism, Unitarian Christianity, Islam), not three persons (Trinitarian Christianity, Hinduism)
